# kMIDIPropertyDisplayName

**Global Variable**

The user-visible name for an endpoint that combines the device and endpoint names.

## Declaration

```swift
let kMIDIPropertyDisplayName: CFString
```

## Discussion

For objects other than endpoints, the display name is the same as its [doc://com.apple.coremidi/documentation/CoreMIDI/kMIDIPropertyName] value.

## Presentation

- **kMIDIPropertyImage**: The full path to a device icon on the system.
